problem_type: Student places halves or fifths fractions beyond 1 on a pre-partitioned number line
workspace_description: Number line from 0 to 2, pre-partitioned into halves with tick marks at 0, 1/2, 1, 3/2, 2. Labels at 0, 1, and 2. Drag palette with 3/2 label.
prompt: Place three-halves on the number line.
